channel.title: RS500.blog
channel.description: Blogging the 500 Greatest Albums of All Time

item.title: Californication
item.description: Thoughts about the 'Californication' album, by Red Hot Chili Peppers, released in 1999 and ranked at #401.

item.title: Illmatic
item.description: Thoughts about the 'Illmatic' album, by Nas, released in 1994 and ranked at #402.

item.title: Lynyrd Skynyrd '(Pronounced Leh-Nerd Skin-Nerd)'
item.description: Thoughts about the 'Lynyrd Skynyrd '(Pronounced Leh-Nerd Skin-Nerd)'' album, by Lynyrd Skynyrd, released in 1973 and ranked at #403.

item.title: Dr. John's Gumbo
item.description: Thoughts about the 'Dr. John's Gumbo' album, by Dr. John, released in 1972 and ranked at #404.

item.title: Radio City
item.description: Thoughts about the 'Radio City' album, by Big Star, released in 1974 and ranked at #405.

item.title: Rid of Me
item.description: Thoughts about the 'Rid of Me' album, by PJ Harvey, released in 1993 and ranked at #406.

item.title: Sandinista
item.description: Thoughts about the 'Sandinista' album, by The Clash, released in 1980 and ranked at #407.

item.title: I Do Not Want What I Haven't Got
item.description: Thoughts about the 'I Do Not Want What I Haven't Got' album, by Sinead O'Connor, released in 1990 and ranked at #408.

item.title: Strange Days
item.description: Thoughts about the 'Strange Days' album, by The Doors, released in 1967 and ranked at #409.

item.title: Time Out of Mind
item.description: Thoughts about the 'Time Out of Mind' album, by Bob Dylan, released in 1997 and ranked at #410.
